description: Um progrmama de caixa para point mix a√ßai

scripts.start: webpack --mode development --config webpack.electron.js && webpack-dev-server --mode development --config webpack.react.js
scripts.build: webpack --mode production --config webpack.electron.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.react.js
